solution: The correct answers are K <= #I, K <= #J and K <= #K.
activity: Replace each occurrence of /*expression*/ with an actual expression and each occurrence of /*relational*/ with a relational operator, then check correctness.
referenceMaterial:
Expressions are formed by combining one or more variables or numbers using arithmetic operators

Arithmetic operators: +, -

Relational operators are =, <, <=, >, >=
